chart_description: The IPv6 Packets chart shows the rate at which IPv6 packets are being sent and received on the network. It includes three dimensions - InDelivers, InReceives, and OutRequests - which provide insight into the number of packets that are successfully delivered to the host, the number of packets that are received by the host, and the number of packets that are requested to be sent from the host, respectively.

dimension_descriptions.InDelivers: The number of IPv6 packets that are successfully delivered to the host per second.
dimension_descriptions.InReceives: The number of IPv6 packets that are received by the host per second.
dimension_descriptions.OutRequests: The number of IPv6 packets that are requested to be sent from the host per second.
